The New Wave Traveler

"Welcome out of the cave, my friend. It's a bit colder out here, but the stars are just beautiful." -Plato

I'm techie girl with a "new age" streak that loves the unexplained phenomenon's of humanity. I view life and my reality as if it were a diorama. I may seem a bit out there, but I'm down to earth, inquisitive, sarcastic, and always longing for the truth. You won't find the typical travel or food reviews here. Instead you'll encounter the esoteric, the unusual, and a deeply felt connection between word and writer.

Why I travel I coined myself as "The New Wave Traveler" from Dolores Cannon's book "The Three Waves of Volunteers." I believe it's my personal mission to not only tell the many stories of our collective, but to also dive deep within my own existence and where I fit into this world.
